config.onekeyminer.title: OneKeyMiner Config
config.onekeyminer.info: Edit the config file to modify settings
config.onekeyminer.option.enabled.toolti: Whether to enable the chain mining feature
config.onekeyminer.option.activation_mod: Choose how to trigger chain mining
config.onekeyminer.option.shape_mode.too: Select the search shape for chain mining
config.onekeyminer.option.max_blocks.too: Maximum blocks mined per chain operation
config.onekeyminer.option.max_distance.t: Maximum search distance for chain mining
config.onekeyminer.option.allow_diagonal: Allow chain mining in diagonal directions
config.onekeyminer.option.consume_durabi: Whether chain mining consumes tool durability
config.onekeyminer.option.stop_low_durab: Automatically stop mining when tool durability is low
config.onekeyminer.option.preserve_durab: Minimum durability to reserve before stopping mining
config.onekeyminer.option.consume_hunger: Whether chain mining consumes hunger points
config.onekeyminer.option.min_hunger.too: Stop chain mining when hunger is below this value
config.onekeyminer.option.mine_all.toolt: Mine all blocks except blacklisted ones (whitelist disabled)
config.onekeyminer.option.allow_bare_han: Trigger chain mining without holding any tool
config.onekeyminer.option.enable_interac: Enable right-click chain features (shearing, tilling, etc.)
config.onekeyminer.option.teleport_drops: Send chain-mined drops directly to player inventory
config.onekeyminer.option.teleport_exp.t: Give chain-mined experience directly to player
config.onekeyminer.option.play_sound.too: Play sound effects during chain mining
config.onekeyminer.option.strict_match.t: Require exact block metadata match for chaining
